original_text: See those ships that sail along like clouds! They come like doves that are flying to their homes. See those ships that sail along like clouds!
korean_text: 저 구름 같이, 비둘기들이 그 보금자리로 날아가는 것 같이 날아오는 자들이 누구냐

sentences.original_text: See those ships that sail along like clouds!
that are flying to their homes
See those ships that sail along like clouds!
